mcq.statement: Choose the correct one: She reminded me on the nice days of my childhood, She reminded me the nice days of my childhood, She reminded me of the nice days of my childhood, She reminded me for the nice days of my childhood

options.a: She reminded me on the nice days of my childhood
options.b: She reminded me the nice days of my childhood
options.c: She reminded me of the nice days of my childhood
options.d: She reminded me for the nice days of my childhood
